title: Average ticket price Atlanta Hawks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2008/09, slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, slightly decreasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, and finally roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2012/13.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009/10 and 2010/11.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 51.78 was reported at Year 2009/10
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 34.75 was reported at Year 2012/13
